document_data.name: Giant bat
document_data.mainbody: '''Giant bats''', also known as '''dire bats''', and sometimes '''large bats''', were giant [[bat]]s the size of horses.
document_data.Description: Dire bats averaged {{SI|200|pounds|k|long=yes}} and had leathery wings that stretched {{SI|15|feet|long=yes}} from end to end. Their bodies were covered in shaggy fur.
document_data.Behavior:
Dire bats hunted at night and rested during the day. They were stealthy and used echolocation to locate prey.

These bats were easy to startle and tended to kill or drive away any other encountered creatures with their bite.
document_data.History:
In the 15{{Th}} century [[DR]], giant bats were commonly known for being the steeds of the [[Lance Defenders]], the army of the [[dragonborn]] nation of [[Tymanther]].

Around [[1374 DR]], one could find them stabled by the [[Zhentarim]] as mounts within the [[Temple in the Sky]].<ref>

Ecology.Habitats:
Dire bats flourished in the deepest regions of the [[Underdark]] and [[Undermountain]].

Beyond the [[Prime Material plane]], giant bats could be found in the [[Domains of Dread]]. With some claiming that they and other bat species were more numerous there than in any other [[plane]] of existence.
